exceptions.exn: In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L v : nat s : Term Unable to unify "codeTerms L codeF 0 (Tnil L)" with "codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF 0 (Tnil L)) v (codeTerm L codeF s)".
Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.

In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat Formula := fol.Formula L : Set Formulas := fol.Formulas L : Set System := fol.System L : Type Term := fol.Term L : Set Terms := fol.Terms L : nat -> Set var := fol.var L : nat -> fol.Term L apply := fol.apply L : forall f : Functions L, fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L n : nat t : fol.Term L ts : fol.Terms L n v : nat s : Term IHts : codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s) Unable to unify "codeSubTerm (codeTerm L codeF ?M1481) ?M1482 (codeTerm L codeF ?M1483) = codeTerm L codeF (substituteTerm L ?M1481 ?M1482 ?M1483)" with "codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF (S n) (Tcons L n t ts)) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF (S n) (Tcons L n (substituteTerm L t v s) (substituteTerms L n ts v s))".

In environment L : Language codeF : Functions L -> nat H : forall (t : fol.Term L) (v : nat) (s : fol.Term L), codeSubTerm (codeTerm L codeF t) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerm L codeF (substituteTerm L t v s) n : nat t : fol.Term L ts : fol.Terms L n v : nat s : fol.Term L IHts : codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s) Unable to unify "codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF n ts) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF n (substituteTerms L n ts v s)" with "codeSubTerms (codeTerms L codeF (S n) (Tcons L n t ts)) v (codeTerm L codeF s) = codeTerms L codeF (S n) (Tcons L n (substituteTerm L t v s) (substituteTerms L n ts v s))".

original: intros n ts v s. induction ts. -- simpl. reflexivity. -- simpl. f_equal. ++ apply codeSubTermCorrect. ++ apply IHts.
